techmeme.title: Sources: China plans to issue guidance as soon as this month to encourage the use of open-source RISC-V chips nationwide for the first time (Reuters)
Internal email: Amazon has formed a new group focused on agentic AI, led by AWS executive Swami Sivasubramanian, who will report directly to AWS CEO Matt Garman (Greg Bensinger/Reuters)
Across Protocol, focused on connecting Ethereum with Layer 2 networks, raised $41M in a token round led by Paradigm, after a $10M token round in November 2022 (Yogita Khatri/The Block)
Sources: Apple filed a complaint to the Investigatory Powers Tribunal over the UK's demand for a backdoor to access users' encrypted data, even of non-UK users (Financial Times)
Google unveils AI-based Scam Detection in Google Messages in English, Android features like live location sharing in the Find My app, and new Pixel features (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
